content: chase away the winter blahs with this colorful crochet wrap that s worked in alpine stitch - an easy-to-memorize 3-row repeat that creates a beautifully textured design colors change for you thanks to red heart with love stripes so you can focus on practicing basic crochet stitches double_crochet around front and back posts alpine stitch and half_double_crochet in the 3rd loop techniques edging is added afterwards by working into front and back post stitches generously sized pockets make it extra cozy while a playful fringe adds fun and flair this must-have wrap is sure to become a go-to choice for comfort and warmth
